```{r}

library(qrcode)

link <- "https://us-east-1.quicksight.aws.amazon.com/sn/accounts/535362115856/dashboards/dc5bfae2-ec29-41d1-adc3-0a7d65a3b51c?directory_alias=vcu-pgx-analysis"

# Generate QR code
qr_code <- qr_code(link)

plot(qr_code)
dev.off()
```
